text: before taking a part the lighter you
need to make sure the lighter is
completely empty out of a flammable
liquid you can empty it by holding it
vertically upright and depress a filter
valve with a
screwdriver now you can take apart the
lighter with a screwdriver and razor
blade you will see the flamable liquid
is empty a trigger and pzo Crystal
connected with two wires
when the body split apart you can remove
the pzo crystal
carefully the pizo crystal is embedded
in the black rectangular plastic body
you can only see the wires attached to
it you can hold the ends of the wires
about 7 mm apart and work the trigger
you should see a
spark connect it with a LED it lights
out when you
trigger here is a closer
look Pio electricity
buzzer take apart the plastic housing
and remove the pza element from the
buzzer you will near a flathead
screwdriver you will see a DC AC
inverter connected with a p
element carefully use a solder iron to
disconnect the wires from the
circuit and then remove the pel element
from the Block
housing place the pzo element on a
speaker and connect the wires with a
Asel
scope use a tone generator to create
sounds with different waveform volume
and
frequency as shown on the soloscope the
PSO element picks out the sound and
generate electrical
[Music]
signals or you can apply voltage to
create Noise by having the PS element
hting the base metal
